testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Login page.................................................passed When User enters "erp.maxgroup@gmail.com" into Username field...............passed And User enters "123" into Password field...................................passed And User Click LogIn button.................................................passed And User Login Successfully.................................................passed

testcase.name: User going create Cheque page
testcase.system-out: And User Click Cheque button................................................passed Then User Click Create Cheque button........................................passed Then User Click TDS&VDS button..............................................passed Then User Click COmpany, TDS Type & Amount Selection button.................passed

testcase.name: For TDS Type
testcase.system-out: Then User Click Select Cheque Type button and select "TDS"..................passed

testcase.name: For Vendor TDS Type
testcase.system-out: Then User Click select TDS Type and select "Vendor TDS".....................passed Then User Click ID Requisition..............................................passed Then User Click Amount nbutton in first row.................................passed

testcase.name: User Fillup Bank Information section
testcase.system-out: Then User Click Bank Select and select "Trust Bank".........................passed Then User Click Account No field and select "0210589481"....................passed Then User Click select Chequebook and select "1122".........................passed

testcase.name: User Fillup Cheque Information section
testcase.system-out: Then User Click Cheque Date CDC.............................................passed Then User Click Beneficiary Name and select "Munnu Traders".................passed Then User Click Cheque Category field and select Bearer Cheque..............passed Then User Click Cheque Auditor field and select "ERP Admin".................passed Then User Click Signatory Authority field and select "ERP Admin"............passed Then User Click TDS Submit button...........................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Data of Transfer Cheque
testcase.system-out: Then User Collect "Check Request Created" Status and Verify.................passed

testcase.name: Approve Transfer Cheque
testcase.system-out: When User Click Select User button for Auditor..............................passed Then User Click Review button...............................................passed Then User Collect "Cheque Request Reviewed" Status and Verify...............passed When User Click Select User button for Creator..............................passed Then User Click Print button................................................passed Then User Close New Tab.....................................................passed Then User Click Confirm button..............................................passed Then User Collect "Cheque Printed" Status and Verify........................passed When User Click Select User button for Cheque Approver......................passed Then User Click Approve button..............................................passed Then User Collect "Cheque Request Approved" Status and Verify...............passed When User Click Select User button for Creator..............................passed Then User Click Deliver button..............................................passed Then User enters "Asif" into Cheque Recever name field......................passed Then User enters "01899999999" into Recever phone Number field..............passed Then User Click Confirm Delevery button.....................................passed Then User Collect "Check Delivered" Status and Verify.......................passed
